common.tagline: The Complete Hub of Brazilian Agribusiness

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the Main Questions about Agroisync

whatIs.question: What is AGROTM?
whatIs.answer: AGROTM is the most complete hub of Brazilian agribusiness, uniting agricultural products marketplace, freight platform and cryptocurrency solutions in a single professional and integrated platform.

payment.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
payment.answer: We offer Basic (free), Pro and Enterprise plans. The basic plan is free and allows access to essential features. Paid plans offer advanced features and greater capacity.

security.question: How to ensure security?
security.answer: We use the best security practices: advanced encryption, two-factor authentication, identity verification, 24/7 monitoring and compliance with international security standards.

nftRights.question: Do NFTs give real rights?
nftRights.answer: Yes, our NFTs represent real rights over agricultural products, freight or project participation. Each NFT is linked to physical assets or legal contracts, ensuring real value.

support.question: How to contact support?
support.answer: We offer multiple channels: 24/7 real-time chat, email (support@agroisync.com), phone (66) 99236-2830 and complete knowledge base. Our team responds within 24 hours.

products.question: How to register products in the Store?
products.answer: To register products, login as a seller, access 'My Products' and fill in the information: name, category, price, stock, description and photos. All products go through moderation.

categories.question: What product categories are accepted?
categories.answer: We accept Inputs (seeds, fertilizers), Machines/Implements, Livestock (cattle, pigs), Commodities (grains, coffee) and Services (consulting, analysis).

payments.question: How does the payment system work?
payments.answer: We accept PIX, Bank Slip and Credit/Debit Card. For high-value products, we offer financing and installment options.

register.question: How to register freight in AgroConecta?
register.answer: Transport companies and drivers can register freight by informing product, quantity, origin, destination, truck type, value and deadline. The system offers tracking and cargo insurance.

cargoTypes.question: What types of cargo are accepted?
cargoTypes.answer: We accept grains (soybeans, corn, wheat), commodities (coffee, cotton), agricultural machinery, live cattle and inputs, with vehicles suitable for each type of cargo.

search.question: How does the freight search system work?
search.answer: Producers can search for freight by origin, destination, product, price and truck type. The system shows real-time options with ratings and transport company history.

accepted.question: What cryptocurrencies are accepted?
accepted.answer: We accept Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Binance Coin (BNB), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT) and Chainlink (LINK).

wallets.question: How does wallet integration work?
wallets.answer: We integrate with MetaMask, Phantom and WalletConnect securely. Wallet addresses are not publicly exposed, ensuring total security.

security.question: Is the system secure for transactions?
security.answer: Yes, we use the best blockchain security practices, with advanced encryption and regular audits. All transactions are tracked and secure.

mobile.question: Does the site work on mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Yes, Agroisync is fully responsive and works perfectly on smartphones, tablets and desktops, with interface optimized for each device.

notifications.question: How does the notification system work?
notifications.answer: We offer real-time notifications for new freight, product updates, messages and order status, via email and push notifications.

availability.question: Is the system always available?
availability.answer: We guarantee 99.9% uptime with robust AWS infrastructure, automatic backups and 24/7 monitoring for maximum availability.
